name: Drop Squad 4
description:
Smash your way through infinite dimensions as a member of the Drop Squad, the intergalactic multi-dimensional (and occasionally questionable) heroes of the multiverse.

Infinite Levels:
Never run out of dimensions to save with randomly created, procedurally generated, and progressively more difficult levels. An infinite roster of interdimensional queens with jewel-headed minions will surprise you with new patterns each time.

Powerful Upgrades:
Call in your wingmen, warp across space, boost your level, summon flaming skulls, or bomb your way through wave after wave of enemy as you strategically plan your drop to get the most power-ups with each leap.

Unlockable Characters:
Choose from a diverse cast of characters in the Drop Squad roster, each with unique upgradeable abilities and anticipate regular updates to the game which will introduce new characters to unlock.

Challenge Yourself:
Challenge yourself by finding your favorite character and upgrade combination, or complete a rotating list of hundreds of challenges each time you play.

Have Fun!
Save dimensions, earn dough, meet colorful characters, smash colorful monsters, drop it to the max!
